name: Moviecom.tv
overview:
Moviecom.tv is an online video platform for the business community. Founder in 2007 in Scotland UK.

The company is 4 years old and has went through a pivotal transformation from being a managed service in 2007/2008 where the founders then spent 2 years proving the model in a Scottish marketplace.

2 years of development through 2009/10 to launch in April 2011 into public beta, with 500 companies. 16 weeks later with 2000 companies signed up and growing daily. The platform is for the business community to integrate video into their online communications.

Moviecom.tv provides a business with a video site to centralise all their video content into their own branded space. A company can upload video form their desktop record video within the account and upload video on the go with the Moviecom.tv iPhone app. Then share to their customers via social media.

Free version currently live, and a Pro version releasing in Sept 11 with many enhanced features.

Moviecom.tv users can generate significant revenue form their accounts where the account owner takes control of their own adverts on their account and retains 100% of the ad revenue.

Moviecom.tv is now scaling across the UK and the CEO is currently exploring International Strategies whilst courting the Investment community for Round A investment.

Moviecom.tv has been privately funded to date, and is 100% capital efficient by the 4 founders.
